Entered the Coliseum at Rome. They immediately
were seeking

And clasping each others hands sate as in
silent contemplation of the scene. But the eyes
of the girl were fixed upon her father's lips" as
his countenance, sublime & sweet, but motionless
as some Praxitelean image of the greatest
of poets filled the silent air with smiles
